description: These text faces have their grabby hands out because they’re trying to grab you in a hug as they go in for the kiss. This way there is no escaping their loving kisses! They might even be reaching in to grab and pinch your cheeks a little. Wow, some of these look a little intense!  ლ(´◉❥◉｀ლ) ლ(|||⌒εー|||)ლ ლ(´ ❥ `ლ) (~￣³￣)~ (づ￣ ³￣)づ
title: Grabby Hands
